desc.name: Test your basic science knowledge with these fun and engaging questions.

quizes.Q: What is the chemical symbol for water?

options: It uses light to produce glucose.
Photosynthesis is a process by which plants use sunlight to synthesize foods.
quizes.A: Photosynthesis is a process by which plants use sunlight to synthesize foods.

desc.name: Brush up on your math fundamentals with these essential questions.

options: It relates sides of a triangle.
The square of the hypotenuse equals the sum of the squares of the other two sides.
quizes.A: The square of the hypotenuse equals the sum of the squares of the other two sides.

desc.name: Explore the world with these basic geography questions.

quizes.Q: What is the capital of France?
Describe the layers of the Earth.
options: The Earth consists of three main layers: crust, mantle, core.
quizes.A: The Earth consists of three main layers: crust, mantle, core.

desc.name: Test your knowledge of technology and its history.

quizes.Q: Who is known as the father of computers?
Explain the concept of cloud computing.
options: Cloud computing involves delivering computing services over the internet.
quizes.A: Cloud computing involves delivering computing services over the internet.

desc.name: Dive into the past with these historical trivia questions.

quizes.Q: Who was the first President of the United States?

options: The Industrial Revolution was a period of major innovation and change.
quizes.A: The Industrial Revolution was a period of major innovation and change.
